SA11sanss19u:3: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss19u:6: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss19u:7: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:12: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:18: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:20: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:22: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:26: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:27: sarvasatvānāṃ kleśamalāt prakṣālayeyaṃ /sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:31: sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām anekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:34: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss19u:38: sarvasatvā vandanīyā bhavantu sadevakasya lokasyêti //athavā yathâryaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:39: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /
SA11sanss19u:41: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
SA11sanss19u:42: tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhyâiva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanss19u:45: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbo-
SA11sanss19u:47: dhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanss19u:48: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
SA11sanss19u:49: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvôtsṛṣṭakāyenâpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkārôpakaraṇena ca /
SA11sanss19u:51: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkārôpakaraṇāni haranti tebhyâivâitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanss19u:52: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodhôtpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:53: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasâparāddhavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:54: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:55: anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:56: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
SA11sanss19u:57: ete cânye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanss19u:62: tvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
SA11sanss19u:66: na bodhisatvena mahāsatvena saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /saced ahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanss19u:67: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss19u:68: aho vatâlpapuṇyâmī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
SA11sanss19u:69_0: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
SA11sanss19u:69_1: satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanss19u:70: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathâṣṭâṅgôpetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanss19u:71: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti //
SA11sanss19u:72: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:74: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ bu-
SA11sanss19u:76_0: ddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
SA11sanss19u:76_1: satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi
SA11sanss19u:78: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo yâivâbhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evâkāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:79: tad yathâpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate /
SA11sanss19u:80: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikâbhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
SA11sanss19u:81: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadêti //
SA11sanss19u:93: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:108: ime maitreya viṃśatir anuśaṃsêti //āryaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ tv āha /
SA11sanss19u:109: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:110: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyâpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11sanss19u:111: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇârādhitaḥ syāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:112: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cârhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlama-
SA11sanss19u:115: tat kiṃ manyase ānandâpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:119: ataḥ sânanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanss19u:120: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanss19u:130: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati /
SA11sanss19u:132: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandânavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetânuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
SA11sanss19u:133: nâitat sthānaṃ vidyatae iti //kathaṃ dharmadānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:136: nu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
SA11sanss19u:137: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśetâlīnacittaḥ //
SA11sanss19u:138: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate /
SA11sanss19u:140: caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:141: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā //
SA11sanss19u:144: sudhautapādaś côpāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena câpi //
SA11sanss19u:145: dharmâsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekâgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan /
SA11sanss19u:146: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś cô bhikṣunikās tathâiva //
SA11sanss19u:147: kilāsitāś câpi vivarjayīta na câpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:148: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca //
SA11sanss19u:149: bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭântakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:150: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathâiva toṣayet na câpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet //
SA11sanss19u:151: khŌüdyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathânnapŌünaṃ vastrŌüṇi śayyâsanacīvarŌüṇi /
SA11sanss19u:152: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñape-
SA11sanss19u:156: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā /
SA11sanss19u:157: etac ca me sarvasukhôpadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //atrâivâha //
SA11sanss19u:158: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇâpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti //
SA11sanss19u:160: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt /
SA11sanss19u:162: evaṃ tvaṃ*vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:163: kathaṃ mahâtmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā //
SA11sanss19u:164: sahasâiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:166: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān /
SA11sanss19u:167: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ //
SA11sanss19u:168: bhaveyur yadi câlpêcchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:169: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām //
SA11sanss19u:172: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ /
SA11sanss19u:199: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārâbhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā /
SA11sanss19u:200_0: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ
SA11sanss19u:200_1: tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyêmāni mantrapadāny
SA11sanss19u:201: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatôpasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe /
SA11sanss19u:202: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti //atrâivâha /
SA11sanss19u:203: dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti //evaṃ dharmadānaṃ //
SA11sanss19u:205: bodhicittaṃ ca puṇyasya vṛddhihetuḥ samāsataḥ //yathôktam āryaratnakaraṇḍakasūtre /
SA11sanss19u:206: tad yathâpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante /
SA11sanss19u:207: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhārôpacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:212: vistaratas tu buddhaviṣayâiva //atra câsyā yathôktāyāḥ śikṣāyāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:215: tatrânutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyâiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātîty anena rakṣā //
SA11sanss19u:216: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatîty anena śuddhiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:217: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati /
SA11sanss19u:218: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatîty ādi /
SA11sanss19u:220: etāni ca nityam apramādâdhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt //
SA11sanss19u:222: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathâiva kṣāntiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:223: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita /
SA11sanss19u:227: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchila-
SA11sanss19u:232: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:234: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanss19u:236: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ câdīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA11sanss19u:238: punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyârakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:239: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca tasyânulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:240: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanss19u:241: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:242: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanss19u:243: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:244: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakâdhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astîti prajānāti /
SA11sanss19u:246: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi //tathā atrâivâha /
SA11sanss19u:250: yad yoniśaś câiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti //āha ca /
SA11sanss19u:254: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyâstv apāratā /
SA11sanss19u:255: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet //
SA11sanss19u:256: tadduṣkhena na me bādhêty ato yadi na rakṣasi /
SA11sanss19u:257: nâgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi //aham eva tadâpîti mithyêyaṃ parikalpanā /
SA11sanss19u:258: anyâiva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate //anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:259: yūnaḥ kiṃ vṛddhakāyasya sukhāya dhanasaṃcayaiḥ //mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate /
SA11sanss19u:266: kāyaś cet pratimâkāraḥ pesībhasmasu nâsti saḥ //
SA11sanss19u:267: sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:269: kāyêty ucyate na saḥ //tatra cintâiva me nâsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān /
SA11sanss19u:270: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā câiva dṛśyate //
SA11sanss19u:275: na guṇavyatirekeṇa pradhānaṃ vidyate yataḥ //na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇâpi /
SA11sanss19u:276: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ nâikavidhaṃ jagat //
SA11sanss19u:278: sukhâder na paṭṭôtpattiḥ paṭṭâdes tu sukhâdayaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:282: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā /
SA11sanss19u:284: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamānaṃ na lakṣyate /
SA11sanss19u:285: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ //saṃtānaḥ samudŌüyaś ca paṅktisenâdivan mṛṣŌü /
SA11sanss19u:286: tatrâbhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate //
SA11sanss19u:289: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parâtmanoḥ //ayuktam api ced etat svâtmany astîtaratra na /
SA11sanss19u:290: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ //
SA11sanss19u:291: kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt /
SA11sanss19u:292: jagadduṣkhaṃ nirūpyêdaṃ kṛpāduṣkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu //evaṃ bhāvitasaṃtānāḥ paraduṣkhasamapriyāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:293: avīcīm avagāhante haṃsāḥ padmavanaṃ yathā //satveṣu mucyamāneṣu ye te prāmodyasāgarāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:294: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇâpy arasena kim //
SA11sanss19u:295: evaṃ parârthaṃ kṛtvâpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:304: puṇyaṃ pravartate tasmād anantaṃ satvadhātuvat //ayaṃ sa mārgapravaraḥ kṣemânantasukhôtsavaḥ /
SA11sanss19u:310: parâtmaduṣkhaśāntyartham ātmâdīn sarvathôtsṛjet //tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati /
SA11sanss19u:311: pariṇāmavināśitvāt sa duṣkhajanako yataḥ //loke duṣkhâgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet /
SA11sanss19u:312: samantād dahyamānasya nakhâdāhe 'pi kiṃ sukham //ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:313: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svârtham utsṛjan //
SA11sanss19u:316: ātmatatvasmṛtiṃ kṛtvā pratītyôtpādacintayā //yad bhayān nôtsṛjāmy etat tad evâdadato bhayaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:317: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ //yadi ni-
SA11sanss19u:320: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayâiva sā //evam ātmānam utsṛjya sarvasatvârtham ācaret /
SA11sanss19u:322: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vôpayojayet //svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ nêha duṣkhakṛt /
SA11sanss19u:328: kopaḥ kasyârtham adyâpi mṛṣā vā tan mayôditam //svârthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss19u:329: nirdayasyâpi kaḥ kopaḥ parârtho yadi naśyati //
SA11sanss19u:332: svāmy-asanena durnyastā nôpabhogyā bhavanti te //cintayati pratīkāraṃ na ca svāmihitêcchayā /
SA11sanss19u:333: nâpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogârthaṃ nôpayāti ca //anusmṛtyôpasmṛtyâitān akṛṣṭôptā jinâtmajāḥ /
SA11sanss19u:334: nānāviṣayadhātūnāṃ sārvêndriyamahāgadān //vijñapya smārayitvâitān kruddhān apy upakāriṇaḥ
SA11sanss19u:338: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //sarvaduścaritenâiṣāṃ satvârthād vinivartanaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:339: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //yāvad ākāśaniṣṭasya niṣṭhā lokasya saṃbhavet /
SA11sanss19u:344: kâiva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī /
SA11sanss19u:345: taddoṣânuśayajño vā yathâtmagurur ātmanaḥ //avirāgy- apalāyī ca karuṇāviṣayo 'pi vā /
SA11sanss19u:346: nityasaṃnihitaś câpi śiṣyâtmasamaḥ kutaḥ //kleśônmatto 'tha mohândhaḥ prapātabahule pathi /
SA11sanss19u:347: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ parâtmā ca sarvadā //skhalitânveṣaṇaṃ tasmāt samānavyasanāj janāt /
SA11sanss19u:348: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvâdbhutaṃ mahat //nâikena śakyam ādātuṃ mayā doṣamahôdadhiḥ /
SA11sanss19u:349: kṛtyam anyair mamâivâtra ko 'nyadoṣeṣu mêkṣaṇaḥ //paracodanadakṣāṇām anadhīṣṭôpakāriṇāṃ /
SA11sanss19u:350: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ //
SA11sanss19u:355: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
SA11sanss19u:356: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt //
SA11sanss19u:362: viduṣā bālavapuṣā lokavismayakāriṇā //mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
SA11sanss19u:372: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathâtyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyôpārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
SA11sanss19u:373: bhavatu sukham anantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam ana-
